LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.Admin.Copy.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter the name of the new created entity.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.Admin.Copy.CopyConditions.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This includes: Conditions, Override Product and Customer Conditions, if there are any.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.Admin.Copy.CopyMappings.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This includes: Widget zones, Product, Category and Manufacturer Mappings, if there are any.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.Admin.ResetDefaultSettings.MessageForPlugins.CurrentValueHint
LocaleResource.Value: Current Value - the currently used value of the setting.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.Admin.ResetDefaultSettings.MessageForPlugins.DefaultValueHint
LocaleResource.Value: Default Value - the default (recommended) value of the setting for DefaultClean theme.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.Admin.ResetDefaultSettings.MessageForThemes.DefaultValueHint
LocaleResource.Value: Default Value - the default (recommended) value of the setting for {0} theme.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.CustomHeadStyles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert your custom css styles that will be added in the head after all other css files. This way you can further customize the theme. Example: .footer { display: none; }

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.EnabledAsWidget
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the theme plugin as widget

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.EnabledAsWidget.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this opton you will enable the widget of the theme plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.PinterestUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert your follow us URL address on pinterest. If left empty the icon in the footer will not be displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.RemoveCopyright.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Remove Copyright notice after a copyright removal key had been purchased by www.nopCommerce.com

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.RemoveDesignedBy
LocaleResource.Value: Remove Designed By Nop-Templates.com link in the footer

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.RemoveDesignedBy.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you would like to receive 10% discount on any future purchase or renewal and a feature spot on our site, please leave this unckecked and contact us.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.VimeoUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert your follow us URL address on vimeo. If left empty the icon in the footer will not be displayed.
